remedies.name: Moringa
remedies.description: Moringa leaves are rich in vitamins and minerals, often used to boost the immune system.
remedies.preparation: Boil fresh or dried moringa leaves in water for 5-10 minutes.
remedies.warnings: Excessive consumption may cause stomach upset.

remedies.name: Neem
remedies.description: Neem leaves have antibacterial and antiviral properties.
remedies.preparation: Boil neem leaves in water for 10 minutes, then strain.
remedies.usage: Drink the tea or use it as a skin wash.

remedies.name: Garlic and Honey
remedies.description: A powerful combination for fighting infections and boosting immunity.
remedies.preparation: Crush garlic cloves and mix with raw honey. Let it sit for 24 hours.
remedies.usage: Take 1 teaspoon daily for prevention, 3 times daily when sick.
remedies.warnings: May cause bad breath and interact with blood thinners.

remedies.name: Ginger Tea
remedies.description: Ginger has anti-inflammatory and digestive properties.
remedies.preparation: Slice fresh ginger root and steep in hot water for 10 minutes.

remedies.name: Aloe Vera
remedies.description: Soothes burns, heals wounds, and aids digestion.
remedies.preparation: Extract gel from aloe vera leaves.
remedies.usage: Apply topically for burns or mix with juice for internal use.
remedies.warnings: Do not consume aloe latex (yellow sap near the skin).

remedies.name: Soursop Leaves
remedies.description: Traditionally used for various ailments including infections and inflammation.
remedies.preparation: Boil 3-5 leaves in water for 10 minutes.

remedies.name: African Potato
remedies.description: Boosts immune system and has anti-inflammatory properties.
remedies.usage: Eat as a vegetable or make into a tea.

remedies.name: Bitter Leaf
remedies.description: Traditional remedy for fever, malaria, and digestive issues.
remedies.preparation: Wash leaves thoroughly and squeeze out the bitter juice.
remedies.usage: Drink small amounts or use in soups.

remedies.name: Rooibos Tea
remedies.description: Antioxidant-rich tea that supports the immune system.
remedies.preparation: Steep rooibos leaves in hot water for 5-7 minutes.
remedies.warnings: Generally safe with no known side effects.

remedies.name: Baobab Fruit
remedies.description: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, supports immune health.
remedies.preparation: Mix baobab powder with water or juice.
